dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: As the last notes of Monika and Sayori’s song fade, Yuri and Natsuki walk back into the music room, both with bashful smiles on their faces.

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Ah, did we miss a special performance?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Ehehehe, we were just celebrating with a song. With how great things have been, how can we not?"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Unfortunately we have to cut the celebration short, heh heh."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Yuri and I were approached by the Music Club President, and they’re gonna need their room back real soon."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "That must mean it’s almost time for our own club meeting."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I do feel bad that we keep using their space, but the acoustics in here are amazing. Perfect for singing or just thinking out loud."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "We got a little extra time before our club meet starts, so I have an idea!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Let’s all sing together! Duets are nice, but imagine how we’d all sound harmonizing at once!"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Count me in. I’m more excited to do this than ever."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Uhu, I’d love to join in as well."
